message: I'm being generous this round, but next time I might not be so kind. Let's get this over with quickly!
I'm not sure what your strategy is, Alice, but this time I'm taking the bigger share. We both know the money loses value with each round, so let's make a deal before it's too late.
I'm willing to give you a little more this time, Bob, but I'm not going to give you the majority. Let's find a compromise before we both lose out!
